thread.title: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17
thread.title_full: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17

author: Staff Writer - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17
text: Prince's Picks: Back these 3 NFL plays in Week 17 Are you ready for BetFTW senior writer Prince J. Grimes' final picks of 2023? All 3 of Prince's Week 17 picks kick off at 1 p.m. ET Sunday with two games involving big spreads. To start off, Prince likes a double-digit home favorite in an NFC matchup featuring a team with a shot at capturing the No. 1 seed in its conference. His second pick is a double-digit road underdog in an AFC East tilt, while his final selection comes out of the Las Vegas Raiders (7-8) at Indianapolis Colts (8-7) matchup. Check out [USA TODAY Sports Scores and Sports Betting Odds hub](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/football/nfl/scores) for a full list of scores and odds. üèà PRINCE‚ÄôS PICKS üèà via [@betwayusa] The Eagles and Bills are both massive home favorites in Week 17, but [@pgprincej]is fading one of them as he looks to close 2023 on a winning note.
